effect.en: If your opponent has any Fighting Pokémon in play, this attack does 20 damage plus 60 more damage.
effect.fr: Si votre adversaire dispose de n’importe quel Pokémon Fighting en jeu, cette attaque inflige 20 dégâts plus 60 dégâts supplémentaires.

effect.en: Your opponent discards a card from his or her hand.
effect.fr: Votre adversaire défausse une carte de sa main.

description.en: Upon hearing its eerie howls, other Pokémon get the shivers and head straight back to their nests.
